Dont push to git unless asked to do so.

when im sending you "git it up"
please also update the linear ticket with relevent final informatpush to git.

When implementing a feature use the component library. if the Figma refrence is not using the component library or the styles we agreed on, call it out and ask for resolution.

Ask questions if there are any before starting a new ticket
